content: {"name": "Silver Spring Christian Reformed Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Starting June 2023, the food pantry distribution will be on second Tuesday, 3:00 PM to 5:00 PM.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.sscrc.org/food-pantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1501 Arcola Ave", "address_2": null, "city": "Silver Spring", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20902", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.045921, "longitude": -77.03125}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 284-8401", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Will reschedule in case of holiday closures"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
